translations: v.合作，协作；勾结，通敌（collaborate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Researchers around the world are collaborating to develop a new vaccine.
sentences.translation: 世界各地的研究人员正在合作培育一种新的疫苗。

sentences.sentence: To this end, Aclima has been collaborating with Google's Street View system.
sentences.translation: 为了达到这个目的，Aclima 一直在与谷歌的街景系统合作。

sentences.sentence: Periodically review their emerging strengths and weaknesses with kids and work together on any shortcomings, like difficulty in communicating well or collaborating.
sentences.translation: 定期与孩子们一起回顾他们新表现出来的优点与缺点，然后共同努力克服诸如难以与人沟通或协作的困难。
